statements: SELECT * FROM InventoryManagement ORDER BY material_name ASC, quantity DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM InventoryManagement WHERE material_type='Metal' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT location, material_type FROM InventoryManagement WHERE quantity > 50 AND location='Warehouse A'
SELECT * FROM InventoryManagement WHERE material_type='Plastic' OR material_type='Rubber'
SELECT material_id, material_name, quantity FROM InventoryManagement ORDER BY material_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM InventoryManagement ORDER BY material_name DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT material_name, material_type, quantity FROM InventoryManagement WHERE location = 'Warehouse'
SELECT * FROM InventoryManagement WHERE material_type = 'Electronics' AND quantity > 10
SELECT material_name, location FROM InventoryManagement WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT material_type) AS unique_material_types FROM InventoryManagement
SELECT * FROM RawMaterials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM RawMaterials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM RawMaterials ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM FinishedProducts WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM FinishedProducts ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM RawMaterials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM RawMaterials WHERE material_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM FinishedProducts WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, quantity FROM RawMaterials WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM FinishedProducts WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Raw_Materials;
SELECT raw_material_name, quantity_in_stock FROM Raw_Materials WHERE quantity_in_stock > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM Finished_Products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory_Logs WHERE item_type = 'Raw Material';
SELECT log_id, event_timestamp, quantity_changed FROM Inventory_Logs WHERE event_type = 'Restock' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Raw_Materials WHERE quantity_in_stock > 50 ORDER BY raw_material_name DESC;
SELECT raw_material_name, quantity_in_stock FROM Raw_Materials WHERE quantity_in_stock < 20 AND raw_material_name LIKE '%steel%';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Finished_Products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory_Logs WHERE item_type = 'Raw Material' AND quantity_changed > 100 ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price, quantity_in_stock FROM Finished_Products WHERE quantity_in_stock < 50 ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC, unit_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM raw_materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM raw_materials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM finished_products WHERE sale_price < 50.00;
SELECT product_name, quantity, sale_price FROM finished_products WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY sale_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM raw_materials;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM finished_products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, p.product_name, m.material_name, t.quantity, t.transaction_date FROM transactions t JOIN finished_products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id JOIN raw_materials m ON t.material_id = m.material_id WHERE t.quantity > 10 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;

SELECT p.product_name, s.supplier_name, t.quantity, t.transaction_date FROM transactions t JOIN finished_products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id JOIN suppliers s ON s.supplier_id = m.supplier_id WHERE t.quantity > 5 ORDER BY s.supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM RawMaterials;
SELECT material_name, quantity_in_stock FROM RawMaterials ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_number = '1234567890';
SELECT * FROM FinishedProducts WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM FinishedProducts WHERE quantity_in_stock < 100 ORDER BY quantity_in_stock ASC;
SELECT * FROM RawMaterials WHERE quantity_in_stock > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM FinishedProducts WHERE unit_price < 50 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity_ordered, order_date, delivery_date FROM Orders WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, arrival_date, status FROM Shipments WHERE status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY arrival_date DESC;
